attributes.action: NOT reduce VAT from the current 17.5%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It will cost every company in this country money. All receipts and paperwork will have to be changed. Every website, every price ticket in every shop. And do you really think a few pence in the pound will make a difference - NO. And it will benefit the rich more - they spend more. Please Please don't do it !!!
